EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Reactor for asynch/non-blocking microservices.Confirmation 2 SD
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Using Reactor for asych/non-blocking microservices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Using Reactor for asych/non-blocking microservices. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, December 2, 2014
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=eea4746347a8a071d1317b1e9e2f171d5>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 664 962 446
Thank you,
